summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons administrative logs related to Jeffrey Epstein's suicide watch at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in July 2019. It includes a Suicide Watch Chronological Log cover sheet, inmate history records, and several pages of observation logs with handwritten entries documenting his status and behavior in the days leading up to his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The primary subject of the suicide watch logs, identified by name and registration number (17631-054). The logs track his status and observations while in custody at MCC.

events.title: Epstein placed as not medically cleared
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein's inmate history shows a status entry of 'NOT MEDICALLY CLEARED' beginning on this date.

events.title: Suicide watch begins
events.description: Epstein is placed on 'SUICIDE WATCH' according to the inmate history record.

events.title: Suicide watch ends
events.description: The inmate history record indicates the suicide watch for Epstein ended at 0845 hours.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was on an official suicide watch at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) from July 23, 2019, until the morning of July 24, 2019.
The document includes multiple pages of a 'Suicide Watch Observation Log' with handwritten entries, though much of the handwriting is difficult to decipher.
Epstein's Bureau of Prisons registration number is listed as 17631-054.
An inmate history record shows he was listed as 'NOT MEDICALLY CLEARED' starting July 6, 2019.
The logs are standard prison forms for monitoring inmates on suicide watch, requiring observations to be documented every 15 minutes.
